name: Hero Robot Spider simulator
description: Now is the time to become a real super hero. It's time to be strong, fast and fearless. Start your mission now and rise to the top of glory. Use your strength to free the city from crime. The main character still has to fight evil by playing interesting quests. The hero will fight gangsters and other evil that have filled this city. The hero will have to gain fame and immense popularity in the city. Also, the hero is waiting for exciting chases and battles with various bosses.   Your warrior will have to act in a large modern metropolis. The game has its own stylized graphics. The improved minimap will show you the entire city and the most significant city locations.
